de.axnsoftware.settings.impl

Class PropertiesBackingStoreImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.PropertiesBackingStoreImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackingStore

    public final class PropertiesBackingStoreImpl
extends Object
implements IBackingStore
    The final class PropertiesBackingStoreImpl models a concrete implementation of the IBackingStore interface.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Carsten Klein "cklein"

    • Method Detail

      • deleteProperties

        public void deleteProperties()
                      throws BackingStoreException
        Deletes the properties. Depending on the implementation this could mean that the file will be removed from the file system, or that the entries in a registry will be removed.
        Specified by:
        deleteProperties in interface IBackingStore
        Throws:
        BackingStoreException
